Class IPRangeAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • cetus.analysis.AnalysisPass
      • cetus.analysis.IPAnalysis

  • public class IPRangeAnalysis
extends IPAnalysis
    Class IPRangeAnalysis performs interprocedural range analysis.

      • updateCalls

        public java.util.Set<CallSite> updateCalls​(IPANode node)
        Detects any changes in the range domain before call sites. Detection is made on the pre-selected version of the range domain whose content is accessible and valid in the callee's context.
        Specified by:
        updateCalls in class IPAnalysis
        Parameters:
        node - the node that was just analyzed.
        Returns:
        the set of call sites that were updated.

      • updateCall

        public boolean updateCall​(IPANode node)
        Description copied from class: IPAnalysis
        Updates the effect due to procedure call in the callee.
        Specified by:
        updateCall in class IPAnalysis
        Parameters:
        node - the node that was just analyzed.
        Returns:
        true if the IN data of any call site has been updated.

      • updateReturn

        public boolean updateReturn​(IPANode node)
        Checks any data change due to return from callee and updates the OUT data if applicable.
        Specified by:
        updateReturn in class IPAnalysis
        Parameters:
        node - the node that was just analyzed.
        Returns:
        true if the OUT data of the node has been updated.
